extension.summary: Handles Videos for kisscartoon.me. Graphics by TheHighway, Marquerite, and konbon.
extension.description: Play videos from kisscartoon.me. This project has been ported from the current version of my own KissAnime addon. This project may end up getting re-ported from my KissAnime Re-write project, once that gets finished. Remember to check out KissCartoon.me's site whenever your at a PC. Don't forget to try KissAnime.com for Anime and KissManga.com for Manga.
extension.disclaimer: By using this, you take reponsibility for anything that happens. By using this, you also take resposibility for being older enough, and legal, to view any possible content. Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws before installing. I take no responsibility for any problems this plugin might in any way, form, shape or size cause. This is project is for a LEARNING EXPERIANCE.

extension.description: Browse TMDB and TVDB media
Modified Addons

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Mimic: Облик за Kodi съдържащ елементи от reFocus и Aeon Nox. Благодарности на BigNoid и Jeroen.

Mimic: Eine dreiste Zusammenstellung von Features meiner Lieblings-Skins, darunter Aeon Nox, reFocus und Artic Zephyr.
